title: And in Canterbury
post:
Pope Francis: “I look forward to meeting you in the near future, and to continuing the warm fraternal relations that our predecessors enjoyed.”
Today Sat March 23 2013, it was announced that Anglican Church representatives in New Zealand have elected Taranaki Bishop Philip Richardson as the new Archbishop of New Zealand. 
He will replace the current Anglican Archbishop of New Zealand, David Moxon, who is stepping down in April to head to Rome to become the Anglican Communion’s chief representative to the Roman Catholic Church.
author: daveb of wellington nz
